text: “Nɨ oragh, nɨ dɨkavigh zuamɨra mangɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba deravɨra me mɨkɨmɨva, men navibar amightɨ da deraka. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziamɨn guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ kamaghɨn damighan koghtɨ, datɨrɨghɨn dɨmangan me nɨ ateghtɨ, nɨ bar osɨmtɨzir ekiam iniam. Eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir kam osɨmtɨzir nɨ uan igiamra ikia iza datɨrɨghɨn tuzir osɨmtɨziba, bar dagh afiragham.”
